id_argumento1: To achieve universal access to clean energy by 2030, robust policies are needed to accelerate electrification, enhance energy efficiency and increase investments in renewable energy.
id_argumento2: Without a change in course, an estimated 660 million people will still lack electricity access and around 1.8 billion will go without clean cooking fuels and technologies by 2030.

id_argumento1: To achieve universal access to clean energy by 2030, robust policies are needed to accelerate electrification, enhance energy efficiency and increase investments in renewable energy.
id_argumento2: Investing in decentralized renewable energy, including stand-alone off-grid solar and mini-grids, together with electricity-as-a-service models holds significant potential to bridge the access gap.
